title: DevFest Florida 2016 Announced
brief: The Google Developer Groups of Central Florida, Space Coast and Sun Coast are proud to announce the first annual DevFest Florida 2016 - the largest Google related event in Florida!

title: Top Things to Do in Orlando
brief: Orlando is the home of DevFest Florida 2016. However while you're not at the conference there is so much more to enjoy the weekend of November 5th. While many of you know about a certain mouse that calls the area home we'd like to share all of the other events that are going on in Orlando that weekend.

title: Call for Speakers
brief: We're preparing this DevFest to be full of great content in the Android and Web space but if you've got a great talk about anything in the Google technology space, an amazing app or library, and want to share it in front of your peers we want to hear from you! - DevFest Florida 2016.

title: Tango Hackathon Details
brief: One of the exciting aspects of DevFest Florida is the Tango Hackathon! Are you interested in getting hands on experience with Tango? Looking to build crazy, awesome augmented reality apps that would put Pokemon Go to shame? Tango lets you do this. Check out this article on how to participate in the hackathon to get your Tango app noticed and win some pretty cool prizes.

title: Venue Confirmation announcement
brief: This being our first year, we need to put in extra effort to drum up interest in the event. To that end, weâ€™ve got some great things planned for you! One of those is the venue. We are excited to announce that we've selected the Sheraton Lake Buena Vista as the venue!

title: Tickets on sale now!
brief: Tickets are now on sale! We've got 50 early bird tickets going for $50 each. The tickets go up to full price on October 4th. Folks, we've got fantastic speakers, Google Developer Experts, a Tango hackathon, free food and swag. If you're into Google technology and are going to be in the central Florida area on November 5th you HAVE to make this event!

title: DevFest 2016 Speaker Lineup
brief: The full speaker lineup for DevFest Florida has been announced. We're thrilled to have such a knowledgeable and entertaining speaker lineup for our inaugural DevFest Florida event. Check them out and get your tickets now!

title: Gold Sponsor - Capgemini
brief: We're very appreciative of Capgemini for being a Gold Sponsor of DevFest Florida. Learn a little bit more about Capgemini and see if they can help out your business needs.

title: Gold Sponsor - Code School
brief: We're very appreciative of Code School for being a Gold Sponsor of DevFest Florida. Learn a little bit more about Code School and see if there's a course they're offering that can help you learn a new language or further your career.

title: Gold Sponsor - Nativescript
brief: We're very appreciative of NativeScript for being a Gold Sponsor of DevFest Florida. Learn a little bit more about NativeScript and see how they're making developing mobile apps even easier.

title: Gold Sponsor - Vaadin
brief: We're very appreciative of Vaadin for being a Gold Sponsor of DevFest Florida. Learn a little bit more about Vaadin and see how they're making developing business applications more productive.

title: Diamond Sponsor - Traversoft
brief: We're very appreciative of Traversoft for being our only Diamond Sponsor. Learn about what mobile apps Traversoft has helped build & enhance and see if you're interested in hiring Traversoft to assist you with your mobile projects.
